text: Reza Motorcyclist (Persian title: Reza Motori - ) is a 1970 Iranian crime drama movie directed by Masoud Kimiai and starring Behrouz Vossoughi, Fariba Khatami, Hamideh Kheirabadi, Bahman Mofid. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 crime movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:1970s crime drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Masoud Kimiai
title: Reza Motorcyclist
